name: Red Riding Hood Animation
description: This is an animated illustration based on Little Red Riding Hood created in Construct 3 for my Visual Design for Games class. I wanted the environment to seem dangerous and foreboding, so I made the environment mainly consist of black and gray, with red being used to identify both Red Riding Hood and the wolf. The speed up function was added to make the animation seem more frantic, which is where the particle effects come in.
